Replace.Text: Cheers, to our friendship.
I refuse until I see your true face clearly.
Would you be willing to accept our friendship?
My pleasure.
Unfortunately.
This will be your or my last battle.
The bell of the Inquisition rang.
I was negligent.
You have earned yourself the title of civilization. Ha, how long can your victory last?
Thank you for visiting. Iberia will do its best to entertain them.
No, the Inquisition cannot take such a risk yet.
The judges have brought Iberian specialties, some small wines, and seafood. We hope you can accept them.
Since the Profound Silence, nothing has shaken us.
You are just a villain under the banner of civilization, no different from those Islanders.[NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Carmen I Iberia, the leader of the Iberian Inquisition and the Last Saint. We will eliminate all threats posed by Seaborn, and may you not associate with them.
Since you're here, why don't you come and take a look in our town? Although the past is past, perhaps you can still see the remnants of Iberia's Golden Age.
Thank you for sharing infomations.
Share your capital location with us, it will be a strategic win-win situation.
Please.
Strictly following the doctrine, threats will not have an opportunity to take advantage of. You did the right thing.
(You converted to same religion as they.)
The threat is imminent, you should find solace in our faith.
(You go against their doctrine.)
Let's form an alliance with the court, and together we will eradicate evil spirits
So let's call it a day.
There is no peace between us.
Let's put aside our differences and face the common crisis.
Please yourself.
You need the trust of the Inquisition to step into Iberia.
The Penal Battalion needs to pass through your territory. May I ask if you allow it?
Withdraw your army, don't force us to aim our swords at you.
Very good.
What a pity.
Carmen is very satisfied that you believe in their religion
Carmen is not satisfied that you have violated their faith
Huh?! It's really sudden. So, would you like to dance with me?
In times of crisis, there is no time to discuss these.
Follow my light, I will help you avoid the tide and sea fog. Please accept my friendship.
Thank you so much.
Uh, alrgiht.
No matter what Iberia is going to face is a huge wave or a storm, I will not retreat, nor will my sword waver a bit!
For the survival of the world, I will stand up for the Inquisition and eliminate you. Show your sword!
Sorry teacher, Irene failed.
Judges cannot tolerate retreating in front of evil spirits! But I promised the teacher that Irene can't die here yet...
What I need is common strength, not praise. Ah, this gift looks pretty good Then I'll stay.
I have more important things to deal.
My delegation will arrive in your country soon. After the Profound Silence, Iberia cannot find a decent gift. Please forgive me.
Are you all of this kind of character?
Compared to you, the Aegirs can be considered noble and friendly, even Seaborn cannot compare to your shamelessness.[NEWLINE](Denounces You)
The messenger of the Iberian Inquisition, Irene, studied under Grand Judge Dario. Will you be an enemy or an ally of the Inquisition?
Come and sit in the city near us. If you're willing, I can also take you to the Golden Bay for a stroll.
Yes, thank you very much, friend.
There stands the last lighthouse near the trial court in Gran Faro. If you could tell me about your capital, I would be happy to share more with you.
Hello!
It is our duty to eradicate these barbarians for the cleanliness and virtue of the world, and you have done a great job.
(You have cleared the barbarian camp.)
How can you collude with those barbaric creatures?
(You allow barbarians to cause destruction.)
The scripture says that the lantern of the judge releases the light of faith in our hearts. Would you be willing to take my lantern and form an alliance with us?
So, let's end the war here.
My duty is to mercilessly eliminate you.
After I realized that the essence of this war is mutual harm, perhaps peace is what we have been pursuing. What do you think?
Please go ahead, but be careful not to step into the shadows.
The most dangerous enemy often disguises themselves the most.
My judges want to pass through your territory, will you trust me?
Your army is quite strong, but still inferior to the Iberian judges. I advise you to withdraw as soon as possible.
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_OP_IRENE_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_OP_IRENE_ANY}
Irene approves of you clearing the barbarians
Irene hates you for allowing barbarians to act recklessly
Friend... Well, as long as you don't mind, I'm willing to accept your friendship.
What I need to do is a bit tricky, there's no benefit to being with me.
Would you be willing to accept my friendship? It would be my honor to stand with you.
Oh, thank you very much!
Well, I will become better.
Although I fear the battlefield, for the sake of everyone's future, I will definitely defeat you.
It seems that there is no more opportunity for hesitation, let's start taking action.
If everything goes smoothly, what motivation do we have to continue working hard and make further progress?
If my failure can bring more possibilities for everyone's future, then...
Thank you for your delegation, and I wish you all the best... Peace and happiness.
No, please go back.
Our delegation is unable to prepare any particularly valuable gifts for you Please accept it, it records the sound of waves in my hometown. If you encounter any troubles, just listen to it.
We... We need some changes.
People will know about your wrongdoing, and the court will eventually preside over your trial.[NEWLINE](Denounces You)
Lumen, Jordi Fontanarossa, member of the Iberian Inquisition and disciple of His Excellency Carmen, nice to meet you.
The Inquisition in Gran Faro is not far away. Would you like to take a break and experience my therapy skills.
Thank you for sharing these.
The last lighthouse stands tall in Gran Faro. What is your capital like? Can you tell me?
Very honored.
We are just insignificant people in the world, and the wisdom of our predecessors will accomplish our great deeds. You are well aware of the way.
(You patronized great person.)
Don't complain about your shortcomings, learn from the experiences of adults. If things remain unchanged, there's no talk of the future.
(You didn't patronize great person)
Would you be willing to accept me as an ally? Even if I can only provide you with a faint light, I will do my best.
War is such a tricky thing, peace is the best result.
I long for peaceful times, but I firmly believe that only by eliminating you can peace be brought.
Would you be willing to cease hostilities here? War is always so terrifying and dangerous, and we We need some changes.
Just help yourself.
No, I can't accept it.
Would you be willing to allow our army to pass through your territory.
Please have your troops leave here, this will make us... Feeling suppressed.
{LOC_DIPLO_ACCEPT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_OP_LUMEN_ANY}
{LOC_DIPLO_REJECT_DECLARE_FRIEND_FROM_AI_LEADER_OP_LUMEN_ANY}
Lumen is pleased that you have patronized a great person
Lumen is not satisfied that you ignore the importance of great person
